# What to Test Before Release

## Core Features
- Sign in (magic link, Apple, Google) and sign out
- Create/edit bosses and switch between them
- Add/edit timeline entries
- Chat works and shows typing indicator
- Notifications arrive and open the app
- Subscriptions and premium features

## Make Sure It Works
- Everything syncs across devices
- Works offline and syncs when back online
- iOS, Android, and web all function
- Users only see their own data
